All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AttackUppercut
This class implements the Move interface, and is a move where the warriors attack is boosted upon using.
Battle
This class implements the functionality of a battle
BattleHub
Class for the battles for the day, stores 3 battle instances
Enemy
This class implements an enemy to be assigned to a battle
GameEnvironment
This class implements key aspects of the game functionality, and keeps track of metrics such as score, game length and current day.
Item
Interface for an item, to be used by a player, on a Warrior, to affect its stats
LevelUp
LevelUp class which implements the functionality of an Item.
Move
Interface for a move, to be assigned to a Warrior to use in battle
MusicPlayer
Class for playing the background music, from a file specified by filepath Credit for royalty free music to TommyMutlu, from pixabay.
Player
Class for a player, which stores information specified by the player during setup and handles many events to do with players items and team
Potion
Class for a Potion, which implements Item.
Stab
This class implements the Move interface, and is a move where the warrior simply damages the opponent.
StatBooster
Interface for an item, to be used by a player, on a Warrior, to affect its stats
Store
Class for a store, which stores the state of the current store for the day, and handles purchasing of these items
Warrior
Class for a Warrior, which is a member of either a players team, or the store.
WeakeningWhack
This class implements the Move interface, and is a move where the enemy warriors attack drops upon using.
